data.title: Centerville High School
data.text:
Student Re-enrollment Event

April 3-30, 2024

Changes affect the 2024-2025 school year.

All students will complete this school year (2023-2024) at their current schools.

Seniors (class of 2025) are not affected.

Due to the district's obligations set forth in our federal desegregation case, all students are required to attend school in their residential attendance zones. The only exception will be for students with approved 2024-2025 transfer applications.

Beginning April 3 through April 30, 2024, all parents/legal guardians will be required to re-enroll their children in St. Mary Parish Public Schools.

Full details.

St. Mary Parish School Board is seeking certified person(s) to fill the following critical shortage areas for the 2023-2024 school year:

• Special Education - all grades

• 6-12 Mathematics

• 6-12 Spanish

• 6-12 Science

• 6-12 English

• 6-12 Social Studies

• Pre-K - 5 All Subjects

• Pre-K – 5 All Subjects

• Speech Therapists

• Speech Pathologists

• Audiologists

• Educational Diagnosticians

• School Social Workers

• School Counselors

• School Psychologists

• Interpreters

• Educational Transliterators

• Educators of the deaf or hard of hearing

Link to Critical Shortage Advertisement.
